message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable considering the circumstances.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a better deal for both of us.
Bob, my offer is still diminishing, and yours isn't getting any better for me. I need you to meet me closer to the middle.
You're right, my offers aren't changing, but yours are losing value. I'll take a bit more, considering the circumstances.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offers are losing value fast.  Meet me in the middle, or this deal is off.
I'm not feeling the pressure, Alice. My offers aren't losing value, and I can wait. This is my new proposal.
